translation:
Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844. Most Illustrious Sir

It is incumbent upon Your Excellency Emílio to indicate to the officer the commission he must carry out, and he must come with the vaqueano and four more cavalrymen ready; in this city, one hundred men and cavalry coming from Porto Alegre are expected to arrive, which Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira. Lieutenant Colonel Commander of the 8th Battalion of Hunters. Francisco Pedro de Abreu
